idam wala swabhawaya gathwita rajaye idam,sinnakkara idam washayen warga kihipayaki.rajaye idam yanu rajayata ayath idam we.rajaye idam, idam sanwardhana aagnya panatha yatathe idam nomathi janathawata swarnabhumi,jayabhumi,ranbima wani kondesi sahagatha oppu matha bhukthiya pamanak labade.samanyayen rajaye idamak wikiniya nohaki athara le urumaya athi gnyathin athara pamanak pawarima sidu karayi.kese namuth mewani idamak pawarima saha mudalakata huwamaru karaganimata awasara diya haki baladharaya wanne pranadeshaye pra deshiya lekam we.rajaye idamak milata ganimata sudusu idamak washayen kiwa nohaka.namuth idama pihiti palathe praideshiya lekam waraya eki rajaye idama pawaraganimata likhitha awasaraya laba denne nam eya notharis oppuwak magin pawara ganima waradak nowe.pra deshiya lekam warayage likhitha awasaraya nomathiwa rajaye idamak milata ganima thulin nithiyanukula bhawayak ganumkaruta nolabe.
